LanguageData.AM_GrappleFlyer.label: flying
LanguageData.AM_KnockbackFlyer.label: flying
LanguageData.AM_LassoCloth.label: Lasso
LanguageData.AM_LassoCloth.description: A cloth lasso that can drag enemies into melee range from a distance, or pull friendlies out of harm's way.
LanguageData.AM_LassoDevilstrand.label: Devilstrand Lasso
LanguageData.AM_LassoDevilstrand.description: A devilstrand lasso that can drag enemies into melee range from a distance, or pull friendlies out of harm's way.\nAllows increased lasso reach compared to a regular lasso.
LanguageData.AM_LassoHyperwave.label: Hyperwave Lasso
LanguageData.AM_LassoHyperwave.description: A hyperwave lasso that can drag enemies into melee range from a distance, or pull friendlies out of harm's way.\nAllows increased lasso reach compared to a devilstrand lasso.
LanguageData.AM_DuelSpot.label: місце поединку
LanguageData.AM_DuelSpot.description: Місце для проведення дружніх поединків. Двоє персонажів зі зброєю ближнього бою можуть битися тут задля розваги та тренування.
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.label: Червонолезо
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.description: A legendary weapon of origin unknown.\nThe wielder of this mighty weapon feels compelled to wear a dark trenchcoat and answer questions with a grunt. Some may find this unsettling but none can deny its effectiveness in combat.\nUnlocks a unique and deadly Special Skill animation.
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.tools.edge.label: edge
